actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Human Resources.

official_title: To amend the Head Start Act to entitle certain eligible children to receive Head Start services, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Head Start Entitlement Act of 1992 - Amends the Head Start Act to entitle all of specified eligible children who are three years of age or older to receive services through a Head Start program. Directs the Secretary of Health and Human Services to reserve specified funds under such Act for parent-child centers.

titles.title: To amend the Head Start Act to entitle certain eligible children to receive Head Start services, and for other purposes.
